mapper.sql: a.id, a.profile_id as profileId, a.rule_id as ruleId, a.failure_level as severity, a.inheritance as inheritance, a.note_data as noteData, a.note_user_login as noteUserLogin, a.note_updated_at as noteUpdatedAt, a.note_created_at as noteCreatedAt
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO active_rules (profile_id, rule_id, failure_level, inheritance, note_created_at, note_updated_at, note_user_login, note_data) VALUES (#{profileId}, #{ruleId}, #{severity}, #{inheritance}, #{noteCreatedAt}, #{noteUpdatedAt}, #{noteUserLogin}, #{noteData})
